ygData.subject: Re: Megatron vs. Galvatron
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it can be used as long as Galvatron does have a chance to escape the effect and that empath uses it moderately (ie: not against every bot she sees).

I think it can be used as long as Galvatron does have a chance to 
escape the effect and that empath uses it moderately (ie: not against 
every bot she sees).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: hmm...  time for a councicular (is that a word) debate.  
personally... 
> as long as the power isn't used to directly move another bot 
(paralyzation is 
> a different matter) and it doesn't result in that bots death ie: 
somehow 
> escapable, i have no objections.  This does not mean that you must 
be told 
> how to escape.  there just has to be room to.
